Instruction: Season chicken breasts with salt and pepper.
Grill chicken breasts for 6-8 minutes per side or until cooked through.
Let the chicken rest for a few minutes, then slice thinly.
Chop romaine lettuce into bite-sized pieces and place in a large salad bowl.
Add sliced grilled chicken, Parmesan cheese, croutons, and Caesar dressing to the bowl.
Toss the salad until well combined.
